name: Park Explorer
description: Explore recent photos of our beautifal National Parks in our country! Created using JQuery, MySql, Node.js, Google Maps API, Handlebars.js

name: Giphy Search Engine
description: Any word, any term, This GIF finder does not discriminate! Created with HTML, AJAX, JQuery, JSON, Giphy Web API.

name: Fruit Game
description: A simple fruit game. Can you hit the number exactly? Pick different fruits. Good Luck!

name: Southpark Memory Game
description: A memory game created with React.js that tests your facial memory skills.
